item.title: Report E-2025010102
item.description:
Report E-2025010102

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-13T21:12:50+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-07
  • City: HENDERSON
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R&L RACING, L.L.C.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On January 7, 2025, one (1) 55-gallon drum of lacquer thinner was damaged and released approximately two (2) gallons of product to the trailer interior. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from EnviroServe (ES) to remediate the impacted site. The crew utilized absorbents and hand tools to remove all released product. The damaged drum was placed in one (1) 85-gallon overpack and all impacted materials were containerized in one (1) 55-gallon drum for disposal.
